title: CLOVER: Manchester Close-out
abstractText: This request is for funding to complete the close-down of the CLOVER project, which has been terminated. The funding is as per the previous agreement with STFC, to cover costs outstanding at 31/03/2009.
impactText: This grant was used to close-out the CLOVER project by finishing the Manchester work packages: horns and OMTs. Education,Electronics Cultural
findingsText: We finalised the construction of the horns and OMTs for the CLOVER project. They were built to specifications and ready to be employed in a future instrument. Other experiments willing to measure the CMB-modes can use our design. Education,Electronics
